languages.text: "Когда миссионеры святого Друза отыскали ее тайник, все мои родичи уже приняли мучительную смерть в результате поломок оборудования, а я — погибала. Лишь чудом меня удалось вывести из сна. Три года я лежала в криосклепе, парализованная, слепая, наедине с тьмой, холодом и надеждой на Его милость. Три года плена в ледяной Преисподней. Лишь молитвы благословенных священников не дали мне утратить разум".

traits.locale_text: "Когда миссионеры святого Друза отыскали ее тайник, все мои родичи уже приняли мучительную смерть в результате поломок оборудования, а я — погибала. Лишь чудом меня удалось вывести из сна. Три года я лежала в криосклепе, парализованная, слепая, наедине с тьмой, холодом и надеждой на Его милость. Три года плена в ледяной Преисподней. Лишь молитвы благословенных священников не дали мне утратить разум".

languages.text: "When Saint Drusus missionaries discovered her secret repository, all of my kin had already died excruciating deaths due to equipment failures, and I was dying. It was a miracle that they pulled me out of my slumber. For three years I had lain within the cryo-vault, paralysed, blind, alone with the darkness, the cold, and my hope for His mercy. Three years of imprisonment in a frozen nightmare. Only the prayers of the blessed priests had kept me from losing my mind."
languages.original_text: "Когда миссионеры святого Друза отыскали ее тайник, все мои родичи уже приняли мучительную смерть в результате поломок оборудования, а я — погибала. Лишь чудом меня удалось вывести из сна. Три года я лежала в криосклепе, парализованная, слепая, наедине с тьмой, холодом и надеждой на Его милость. Три года плена в ледяной Преисподней. Лишь молитвы благословенных священников не дали мне утратить разум".

traits.locale_text: "When Saint Drusus missionaries discovered her secret repository, all of my kin had already died excruciating deaths due to equipment failures, and I was dying. It was a miracle that they pulled me out of my slumber. For three years I had lain within the cryo-vault, paralyzed, blind, alone with the darkness, the cold, and the hope for His mercy. Three years of imprisonment in a frozen hell. Only the prayers of the blessed priests had kept me from losing my mind."

It was a miracle that they pulled me out of my slumber. For three years I had lain within the cryo-vault, paralysed, blind, alone with the darkness, the cold, and my hope for His mercy. "When Saint Drusus missionaries discovered her secret repository, all of my kin had already died excruciating deaths due to equipment failures, and I was dying. It was a miracle that they pulled me out of my slumber. For three years I had lain within the cryo-vault, paralysed, blind, alone with the darkness, the cold, and my hope for His mercy. Three years of imprisonment in a frozen hell. Only the prayers of the blessed priests had kept me from losing my mind."

languages.text: 「聖ドルスス聖務団がアスパイスの隠し倉庫を見つけた時には、私の家族全員がすでに死んでいた。設備が故障したせいで、ひどく苦痛な死に方だった。私自身も死にかけてた。聖務団が奇跡的にまどろみから引きずり出してくれた。低温室の中で3年間横たわっていた私の身体は麻痺し、目は見えなくなり、在るのは闇と寒さだけで希望は皇帝の御慈悲だった。3年間、凍結悪夢に監禁されていたのだ。祝福を受けた司祭の、祈りの言葉だけが私の心が折れぬよう支えてくれていた」
languages.original_text: "When Saint Drusus missionaries discovered her secret repository, all of my kin had already died excruciating deaths due to equipment failures, and I was dying. It was a miracle that they pulled me out of my slumber. For three years I had lain within the cryo-vault, paralysed, blind, alone with the darkness, the cold, and my hope for His mercy. Three years of imprisonment in a frozen nightmare. Only the prayers of the blessed priests had kept me from losing my mind."

traits.locale_text: 「聖ドルスス聖務団がアスパイスの隠し倉庫を見つけた時には、私の家族全員がすでに死んでいた。設備が故障したせいで、ひどく苦痛な死に方だった。私自身も死にかけてた。聖務団が奇跡的にまどろみから引きずり出してくれた。低温室の中で3年間横たわっていた私の身体は麻痺し、目は見えなくなり、在るのは闇と寒さだけで希望は皇帝の御慈悲だった。3年間、凍結地獄に監禁されていたのだ。祝福を受けた司祭の、祈りの言葉だけが私の心が折れぬよう支えてくれていた」

languages.text: “当圣德鲁苏斯教派终于发现她的秘密仓库时，我所有的亲人都已经因为设备故障，在极度痛苦中丧命，只剩下我尚存一息。他们能将我从沉眠中唤醒，真是莫大的奇迹。三年来，我就那样静静地躺在冷冻舱里，身体无法动弹，看不见任何东西，孤独地面对漫长的黑暗与寒冷，心中不断祈求神皇的怜悯。整整三年，我被困在那冰寒的噩梦里。只有不断回忆牧师神圣的祷告，才使我不至于彻底失去理智。”
languages.original_text: "When Saint Drusus missionaries discovered her secret repository, all of my kin had already died excruciating deaths due to equipment failures, and I was dying. It was a miracle that they pulled me out of my slumber. For three years I had lain within the cryo-vault, paralysed, blind, alone with the darkness, the cold, and my hope for His mercy. Three years of imprisonment in a frozen nightmare. Only the prayers of the blessed priests had kept me from losing my mind."

traits.locale_text: “当圣德鲁苏斯教派终于发现她的秘密仓库时，我所有的亲人都已经因为设备故障，在极度痛苦中丧命，只剩下我尚存一息。他们能将我从沉眠中唤醒，真是莫大的奇迹。三年来，我就那样静静地躺在冷冻舱里，身体无法动弹，看不见任何东西，孤独地面对漫长的黑暗与寒冷，心中不断祈求神皇的怜悯。整整三年，我被困在那冰寒的地狱里。只有不断回忆牧师神圣的祷告，才使我不至于彻底失去理智。”

languages.text: «Cuando los misioneros de la orden de San Drusus encontraron su almacén secreto, el resto de mi familia había muerto de forma tortuosa por fallos técnicos y yo estaba al borde de acompañarles. Fue un milagro que lograran sacarme de ese sueño. Durante tres años había yacido, paralizada, ciega, sola en la oscuridad, el frío y la esperanza de que el Emperador se apiadara. Tres años encerrada en una pesadilla helada. Solo las oraciones de los benditos sacerdotes evitaron que perdiera la cabeza».
languages.original_text: "When Saint Drusus missionaries discovered her secret repository, all of my kin had already died excruciating deaths due to equipment failures, and I was dying. It was a miracle that they pulled me out of my slumber. For three years I had lain within the cryo-vault, paralysed, blind, alone with the darkness, the cold, and my hope for His mercy. Three years of imprisonment in a frozen nightmare. Only the prayers of the blessed priests had kept me from losing my mind."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando los misioneros de la orden de San Drusus encontraron su almacén secreto, el resto de mi familia había muerto de forma tortuosa por fallos técnicos y yo estaba al borde de acompañarles. Fue un milagro que lograran sacarme de ese sueño. Durante tres años había yacido, paralizada, ciega, sola en la oscuridad, el frío y la esperanza de que el Emperador se apiadara. Tres años encerrada en un infierno helado. Solo las oraciones de los benditos sacerdotes evitaron que perdiera la cabeza».

languages.text: « Mes proches sont morts dans d'abominables souffrances les uns après les autres, à cause de pannes d'équipement. Quand les missionnaires de Saint Drusus ont découvert cet entrepôt secret, j'étais moi-même aux portes de la mort, et c'est bien un miracle qu'ils aient réussi à me réveiller. J'ai passé trois ans dans cette chambre cryogénique, paralysée, aveugle, livrée aux ténèbres et au froid, avec pour seule compagnie l'espoir qu'Il m'offre Sa miséricorde. Trois ans enfermée dans un cauchemar glacial. Si je n'ai pas perdu l'esprit, c'est uniquement grâce aux prières des prêtres, bénis soient-ils. »
languages.original_text: "When Saint Drusus missionaries discovered her secret repository, all of my kin had already died excruciating deaths due to equipment failures, and I was dying. It was a miracle that they pulled me out of my slumber. For three years I had lain within the cryo-vault, paralysed, blind, alone with the darkness, the cold, and my hope for His mercy. Three years of imprisonment in a frozen nightmare. Only the prayers of the blessed priests had kept me from losing my mind."

traits.locale_text: « Mes proches sont morts dans d'abominables souffrances les uns après les autres, à cause de pannes de l'équipement. Quand les missionnaires de Saint Drusus ont découvert cet entrepôt secret, j'étais moi-même aux portes de la mort, et c'est bien un miracle qu'ils aient réussi à me réveiller. J'ai passé trois ans dans cette chambre cryogénique, paralysée, aveugle, seule dans les ténèbres, le froid, avec pour seule compagnie l'espoir qu'Il m'offre Sa miséricorde. Trois ans enfermée dans un enfer glacial. Si je n'ai pas perdu l'esprit, c'est uniquement grâce aux prières des prêtres, bénis soient-ils. »

languages.text: "Als Missionare des Heiligen Drusus ihre geheime Lagerstätte entdeckten, war meine gesamte Verwandtschaft aufgrund von technischen Ausfällen bereits einen grausamen Tod gestorben, und auch ich lag in den letzten Zügen. Es war ein Wunder, dass sie mich aus meinem Schlummer holen konnten. Drei Jahre lang hatte ich gelähmt und blind in dem Cryo-Grab gelegen, alleine in der Dunkelheit, der Kälte, nur mit meiner Hoffnung auf Seine Gnade. Drei Jahre Gefangenschaft in einem gefrorenen Albtraum. Nur dank der Gebete der gesegneten Priester habe ich meinen Verstand nicht verloren."
languages.original_text: "When Saint Drusus missionaries discovered her secret repository, all of my kin had already died excruciating deaths due to equipment failures, and I was dying. It was a miracle that they pulled me out of my slumber. For three years I had lain within the cryo-vault, paralysed, blind, alone with the darkness, the cold, and my hope for His mercy. Three years of imprisonment in a frozen nightmare. Only the prayers of the blessed priests had kept me from losing my mind."

traits.locale_text: "Als Missionare des Hl. Drusus ihre geheime Lagerstätte entdeckten, war meine gesamte Verwandtschaft aufgrund von technischen Ausfällen bereits einen grausamen Tod gestorben, und auch ich lag in den letzten Zügen. Es war ein Wunder, dass sie mich aus meinem Schlummer holen konnten. Drei Jahre lang hatte ich gelähmt und blind in dem Cryo-Grab gelegen, alleine in der Dunkelheit, der Kälte, nur mit meiner Hoffnung auf Seine Gnade. Drei Jahre Gefangenschaft in einer gefrorenen Hölle. Nur dank der Gebete der gesegneten Priester habe ich meinen Verstand nicht verloren."

languages.text: "Aziz Drusus misyonerleri gizli depoyu keşfettiklerinde, tüm akrabalarım ekipman arızaları nedeniyle acılar içinde ölmüştü. Ben de ölmek üzereydim. Beni uykumdan çekip çıkarmaları mucizeydi. Üç yıl boyunca kriyomahzenin içinde felçli ve kör hâlde; karanlık, soğuk ve O'nun merhametine olan umudumla baş başa kalmıştım. Buzdan bir kâbusun içinde üç yıl hapis. Aklımı yitirmemi önleyen tek şey, mübarek rahiplerin duaları oldu."
languages.original_text: "When Saint Drusus missionaries discovered her secret repository, all of my kin had already died excruciating deaths due to equipment failures, and I was dying. It was a miracle that they pulled me out of my slumber. For three years I had lain within the cryo-vault, paralysed, blind, alone with the darkness, the cold, and my hope for His mercy. Three years of imprisonment in a frozen nightmare. Only the prayers of the blessed priests had kept me from losing my mind."

traits.locale_text: "Aziz Drusus misyonerleri gizli depoyu keşfettiklerinde, tüm akrabalarım ekipman arızaları nedeniyle acılar içinde ölmüştü. Ben de ölmek üzereydim. Beni uykumdan çekip çıkarmaları mucizeydi. Üç yıl boyunca kriyomahzenin içinde felçli ve kör hâlde; karanlık, soğuk ve O'nun merhametine olan umudumla baş başa kalmıştım. Buzdan bir kâbusun içinde üç yıl hapis. Aklımı yitirmemi önleyen tek şey, mübarek rahiplerin duaları oldu."
